item.title: Reading Book Collection
item.description: Beeing somewhat an avid reader, I usually get queries on books I can suggest to people for them to read. So I would recommend and eventually realised most of what I recommend I need to track them. So the simple table below contains titles I have read. Not a comprehensive list though and it has more than enough. I will try to update as much as possible.
